content.text: The Belugans were a crystalline-aquatic species native to the planet Quarzite.

A famous member of these species, Otua Blank, was the corpulent, tyrannical dictator of the planet during the Clone Wars. They disliked the Kage, as they had a raging war against them, and to them, the Kage were considered marauders.

The armed forces on Quarzite were known as the Belugan Guards, named after their member's species. Their primary weapon was the Belugan blaster, a small but deadly weapon. The species did show some martial arts, as Major Rigosso was seen giving a butterfly kick to an incoming Kage Warrior.
